full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 FAR.EAST-PLACEMENT AGENCY 9267 3511 W. 6th ST. LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90005 FAR EAST PLACEMENT AGENCY EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT CALIFORNIA This contract for employment is made by and between the following: Mr. & Mrs. Nathaniel Paschall DEO 191 11011 herein called 'Employer' and ADDENDUM Lau Chuen & Chan Nui herein called 'Domestic Help' The parties hereto agree as follows: The TERM: Commencing upon Domestic Help's arrival at the residence of the Employer, the Employer hereby employs the Domestic Help, and the Domestic Help hereby agrees to serve the Employer as a domestic for a period of 24 months. (Twenty four) 8. 2. PERFORMANCE AND DUTIES: Domestic Help agrees to devote her/his full time and effort in carrying forward the duties as assigned by the Employer, and at all times, on and off duty, to conduct herself/himself in a proper manner, and Employer agrees to treat Domestic Help fairly and properly. em 3. SALARY: The Employer agrees to pay the Domestic Help, in addition to full board and lodging, a the agency by the employer IN NO salary of MARCEABLE $660 per month Traval per month. Further, after completion of 12 have the funds months employment hereunder, the Domestic Help will receive one week's fully paid vacation at a time to be designated by the Employer, or if the Domestic Help so elects, in lieu of said vacation, an additional, week's salary. 4. TERMINATION OF CONTRACT: This Contract is terminable only upon justification, and if a dispute arises respecting the justification, then said justification shall be determined by the Labor Commissioner of the State of California 5. LABOR LAWS: The Employer agrees to comply with Federal and State laws regulating the type of labor to be performed hereunder and to make the proper deductions from the gross pay of the Domestic Help as provided for under Federal and State law huraday and other Sunday, 6. SICKNESS: In the event the Domestic Help becomes ill, the Employer shall provide food, accomodations and salary for not more than fifteen (15) days during each year of this Contract, but Employer shall have no responsibility for costs of medical attention for the Domestic Help. EMPLOYER: Mr. matternil for ball Katharine P. Paseball Mrs. Address: 790 Fairfield Circle, Pasadena, California 91106 Subscribed and sworn to DATE before me on STATE OF California Annette defferent County of his angeles (SEAL) Notary Public in and for said County and State ANNEVE SEFFEROVICH My Commission Expires June 7, 1970 Los DOMESTIC HELP: Signed: Lan shun BiP x Dated: OcT. 30 ,1968 Address: Arbuthnot Road, 3/A, Top Floor, Hong Kong.
